body.p: Covington, Kentucky, attorney. Pennsylvania native. Moved to New Castle, Kentucky, as an infant. Educated at the grammar school of Columbia College in New York, New York. Graduated from Kenyon College in Gambier, Ohio, in 1856. Read law with Mengies & Pryor in Covington in 1858. Graduated Cincinnati Law School in Cincinnati, Ohio, and passed the bar in 1860. Married [Unknown] Winston Hamilton in 1861. Father of J. E. Hamilton and E. C. Hamilton. Attorney in Covington in 1860.
